Class Pawn

java.lang.Object
model.Piece
model.Pawn
public class Pawn
extends Piece
Class for a pawn piece, which is a subclass of a Piece object.

  • Method Details

    • promote

      public static void promote​(java.lang.String input, Square[][] board, boolean isWhite, int file, int rank)
      Changes type of pawn to a queen, knight, bishop, or rook
      Parameters:
      input - the raw input string provided by the user within chess.java
      board - the game board created within chess.java
      isWhite - boolean that indicates if the pawn piece is white
      file - file location of pawn
      rank - rank location of pawn
